titleInfo.title: USA v. Hansen
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - The Federal Public Defender appointed as counsel as to defendant Joe A. Hansen. Signed by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett on 8/7/2006. (MLF, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - The Federal Public Defender appointed as counsel as to defendant Joe A. Hansen. Signed by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett on 8/7/2006. (MLF, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Hansen
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER sustaining 20 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture; the US Marshal for the District of Nebraska is hereby authorized to seize the following-described properties: a 1995 Ford Commercial Truck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660 and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun; the defendant's interest in said properties is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition; the aforementioned forfeited properties are to be held by the Marshal in his secure suctody and control as to Joe A. Hansen (1) Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon.(PCV, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER sustaining 20 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture; the US Marshal for the District of Nebraska is hereby authorized to seize the following-described properties: a 1995 Ford Commercial Truck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660 and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun; the defendant's interest in said properties is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition; the aforementioned forfeited properties are to be held by the Marshal in his secure suctody and control as to Joe A. Hansen (1) Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon.(PCV, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Hansen
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER sustaining 25 Motion for Final Forfeiture as to Joe A. Hansen (1); The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained.All right, title and interest in and to the subject properties, i.e.,a 1995 Ford CommercialTruck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660, and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun, held by any personor entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed.The subject properties, i.e., a 1995 Ford Commercial Truck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660,and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United Statesof America.The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of saidproperty in accordance with law. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. Certified copy to USM.(ETC)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER sustaining 25 Motion for Final Forfeiture as to Joe A. Hansen (1); The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained.All right, title and interest in and to the subject properties, i.e.,a 1995 Ford CommercialTruck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660, and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun, held by any personor entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed.The subject properties, i.e., a 1995 Ford Commercial Truck, VIN 1FTJS34GXSHA17660,and a Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United Statesof America.The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of saidproperty in accordance with law. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. Certified copy to USM.(ETC)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Hansen
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Joe A. Hansen (1), Counts 1, 3-4, 5, 6 - Counts I, III, IV, V and VI of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only; Counts 2,7,8 - DEFENDANT pleaded guilty to counts II, VII and VIII of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of forty-six (46) months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment as to defendant Joe A. Hansen. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons. Final order of forfeiture filed on 12/28/2006 as to Counts VII and VIII. The defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States:1995 Ford Commercial Truck and Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun. Ordered by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon. (4 certified copies given to US Marshal) (ADB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to Joe A. Hansen. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons. Final order of forfeiture filed on 12/28/2006 as to Counts VII and VIII. The defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States:1995 Ford Commercial Truck and Maverick Arms 12 gauge shotgun. Ordered by Judge Joseph F.
